flawed_nl_solution:
Greta the goose eats 20/10=<<20/10=2>>2 pounds of food per day.
Milton the mouse eats (1/100)*2=0.02 of a pound of food per day.
Elmer the elephant eats 4000*(0.02)=<<4000*(0.02)=80>>80 pounds of food per day.
Thus, Elmer eats 80-20=55 pounds more food per day than does Penelope the pig.
#### 55

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 55. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
